metadata.title: Obsidian x Feiniu NAS: Building a Free Cross-Platform Note Sync & Backup Solution
metadata.desc: I restarted journaling on August 1st, 2019, and have now kept it up for 6 years! Initially, I used a cloud note app, but four months ago I gradually migrated all the data to my home NAS. When I scraped the data back, I was surprised to find it was nearly 8 GB... I always thought it was mostly text, but turns out I included quite a few images. Looking back through it all, my life has been pretty colorful, haha!
metadata.keywords: NAS,fnOS,Obsidian,Note sync,Note backup,Obsidian sync,Obsidian backup,Obsidian WebDAV

metadata.title: A modern flat ESLint configuration for ESLint V9
metadata.desc: ESLint v9.0.0 is a major release of ESLint, it has several breaking changes, the biggest of which is the use of its configuration files and plugin ecosystem. For new projects, I provide an ESLint Config package with some of my personal commonly used ESLint configurations built in.

metadata.title: git-commit-analytics: analyze git commit records to generate daily work reports
metadata.desc: A tool to analyze your git repository's commit log. It can help you generate daily/weekly or longer work reports.
metadata.keywords: git log,git commit analytics,git report,git commit report,git log report

metadata.title: vite-plugin-banner: add custom banner comments to your vite build outputs
metadata.desc: A banner plugin for Vite, It can adds a banner to the top of each generated chunk.
